thread.title: Taylor Swift Brings Out Tove Lo Onstage at Atlanta Concert
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift Brings Out Tove Lo Onstage at Atlanta Concert

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Taylor Swift Brings Out Tove Lo Onstage at Atlanta Concert
text:
Comments Swift joined Lo to perform her guest's hit 'Talking Body' for more than 50,000 people attending her show at the Georgia Dome over the weekend. 
Taylor Swift has just added Tove Lo to the long list of surprise guests on her ongoing "1989" tour. During a stop in Atlanta over the weekend, the pop diva brought out the Swedish singer to perform "Talking Body" for a massive crowd of more than 50,000 Swifties at the Georgia Dome. Lo emerged onstage in a black bodysuit with silver details underneath a leather jacket. Along with Swift, who wore her signature sparkly blue outfit, she strutted her stuff surrounded by a bunch of shirtless male dancers. " 'Talking Body' with @tovelo in Atlanta!!! Everyone knew every word, and she KILLED IT!!" Swift wrote next to one Instagram picture of her and Lo posing together on the stage. She then shared with her followers a couple of videos taken during the performance and a photo snapped during rehearsal. A photo posted by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift) on Oct 24, 2015 at 9:49pm PDT A photo posted by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift) on Oct 24, 2015 at 9:55pm PDT Lo took to her own Instagram page to thank Swift and expressed her excitement. "Unreal. @taylorswift I can't thank you and your fans enough for this night. Playing for 56,000 people (!!!) was one of the most incredible experiences of my life. I will never forget this," she said. A photo posted by Tove Lo (@tovelo) on Oct 24, 2015 at 10:08pm PDT
